llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 25th): Salt Lake City to San Luis Obispo

* Departure from Salt Lake City at 08:00 AM (flight F3817140, duration: 2 hours 13 minutes, cost: $286)
* Arrival in San Luis Obispo at 10:13 AM
* Check-in at a private room accommodation (cost: $150)
* Explore downtown San Luis Obispo and visit the Mission San Luis Obispo de Tolosa

Day 2 (March 26th): San Luis Obispo to Los Angeles

* Departure from San Luis Obispo at 09:00 AM (flight F3823725, duration: 1 hour 48 minutes, cost: $282)
* Arrival in Los Angeles at 11:48 AM
* Check-in at a private room accommodation (cost: $160)
* Visit Universal Studios Hollywood and take a behind-the-scenes tour of movie sets and soundstages

Day 3 (March 27th): Los Angeles

* Full day in Los Angeles for sightseeing and shopping (cost: $150)
* Visit the Griffith Observatory, Hollywood Walk of Fame, and Beverly Hills

Day 4 (March 28th): Los Angeles to San Francisco

* Departure from Los Angeles at 09:00 AM (flight F3799899, duration: 1 hour 51 minutes, cost: $265)
* Arrival in San Francisco at 11:41 AM
* Check-in at a private room accommodation (cost: $160)
* Explore Fisherman's Wharf and take a boat tour of Alcatraz Island

Day 5 (March 29th): San Francisco

* Full day in San Francisco for sightseeing and exploring (cost: $180)
* Visit the Golden Gate Bridge, Chinatown, and Union Square

Day 6 (March 30th): San Francisco to Sacramento

* Departure from San Francisco at 09:00 AM (flight F3528613, duration: 1 hour 41 minutes, cost: $214)
* Arrival in Sacramento at 11:25 AM
* Check-in at a private room accommodation (cost: $120)
* Visit the California State Railroad Museum and take a ride on a historic train

Day 7 (March 31st): Sacramento to Salt Lake City

* Departure from Sacramento at 09:00 AM (flight F3591160, duration: 2 hours 12 minutes, cost: $408)
* Arrival in Salt Lake City at 11:12 AM

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $1,777 (2 x $889)
* Accommodations: $1,020 (3 x $340)
* Transportation: $600 (3 x $200)
* Food and Activities: $1,900 (3 x $630)

Total Budget: $4,600

Note: The budget breakdown is an estimate based on the given itinerary and transportation costs. Actual costs may vary depending on various factors such as flight prices, accommodation rates, and personal spending habits.
